page.title: 10REDCAR STEEL WORKS
page.content: STEEL HOUSE is just inside the main entrance for the Redcar works,(in the interests of security the only entrance). Redcar produces the iron which is then made into steel.To do this it uses a very large blast furnace(over 96 metres high),it can produce over 10000 tons of iron a day.Originaly it was planned that there would be another blast furnace of the same type next to it,it was even bought,but then the demand for steel dropped and the bits of the second furnace still lie around on the land west of steel house The furnace is shortly to be re-lined Usually the furnace must be kept to a certain temperature,and is only shut down once every few mounths for a day or so,but every 8 years the lining of the furnace must be removed and replaced.this takes several mounths.
